BR_text.BRsummary: Over rapped TFX libraries character layout into TensorFlow Serving and Model Server on Docs
BR_text.BRdescription:
I found one part of the broken image in TFX docs.
 But I can't edit this SVG, so I reported as issues.
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2786333/77253640-d9a01100-6c9e-11ea-9921-3837d62b76ae.png></denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/blob/master/docs/guide/libraries_components.svg>https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/blob/master/docs/guide/libraries_components.svg</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
Thank you for reporting!
 Did you see this image in the guide document in <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/guide>https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/guide</denchmark-link>
  ?
 Because it renders well in my environment, can you share your browser environment when the image is broken?

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jiyongjung0>@jiyongjung0</denchmark-link>
  Thanks for response 
 
 Did you see this image in the guide document in https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/guide ?
 right.
 
 I use Mac OS Chrome 80.0.3987.149.
 I see.
 My browser render below image in <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/guide#tfx_libraries>https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/guide#tfx_libraries</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2786333/77499188-c191e280-6e94-11ea-99e9-e174a565ff86.png></denchmark-link>
 
 
 Because it renders well in my environment
 
 Seem like this issues is not serious.

comments_2.comment_text:
Thank you for the detail!
 I'm using exactly same broswer / version, but it looks good.
 But I found that the image looks ugly(as you have shown above) in MacOS Safari 13.0.5.
 I think that this can be fixed by using png or other formats.
